Name: Slime Rule
About the game: Follow in the footsteps of Fancy - a country girl, breaking into the Uzacan castle. A place where monsters live. Discover strange events. Collect rare treasures. Face the mighty demon lords. In this war, what makes the difference is knowledge. After this adventure, you will surely gain a lot of interesting and useful knowledge. Key Features - A lot of interesting quizs. - Mixed RPG elements - Relaxing game
